title: [BUG] Refactor @Service annotation bean name
body:
## What is the purpose of the change

There was an issue that Spring `ApplicationContext` will register some `@Service` annotation beans with different version as a Spring Bean.

## Brief changelog

Refactor `@Service` annotation bean name should be composed by those meta data at least:
* `@Service#interfaceName`
* `@Service#version`
* `@Service#group`

## Verifying this change

title: [Dubbo-1637] Fix When using hibernate-validator, class 'org.hibernate.validator.internal.metadata.descriptor.ConstraintDescriptorImpl' is wrong with hessian deserialization.
body:
bugfix：When using hibernate-validator, class 'org.hibernate.validator.internal.metadata.descriptor.ConstraintDescriptorImpl' is wrong with hessian deserialization.

## What is the purpose of the change

When jsr303 uses hibernate-validator，Dubbo serialization using hessian，Set validation=true on the provider side，Client cannot receive validation information，The error is as follows：com.alibaba.com.caucho.hessian.io.HessianProtocolException: 'org.hibernate.validator.internal.metadata.descriptor.ConstraintDescriptorImpl' could not be instantiated

## Brief changelog

1. add class: com.alibaba.dubbo.validation.support.jsr303.DubboConstraintViolation
2. add class: com.alibaba.dubbo.validation.support.jsr303.DubboConstraintViolationException
3. modify class: com.alibaba.dubbo.validation.filter.ValidationFilter

Fixes #1637

title: Issue about the provider side parameter validation
body:
More details pls review https://github.com/apache/incubator-dubbo/issues/1637

Dubbo version: 2.5.3

## What is the purpose of the change

Solve the provider side parameter validation issue, we can't parse the validation errors in the ExceptionHandler when use validation="true" on the provider side.

## Brief changelog

Add custom implementation to wrap the validation errors to solve deserialization issue, and rethrow to consumer.
Add demo with parameter which need validation check.
Add dependency (hibernate validator and el)

## Verifying this change

Run demo, and check if we can get the validation errors by ExceptionHandler.

title: [Dubbo-1619] Fix exception stack trace during provider demo start.
body:
## What is the purpose of the change

Fix exception stack trace during provider demo start.

## Brief changelog

When running the provider demo locally, the provider will try to connect to the ip specified in the registry url in order. In the demo code, a multicast address is specified, however, there is no need to connected to the multicast address since it will eventually failed. The failure of connecting to that address logs an warn message with exception trace. Although there is no harm, it will still make user confused.

This pull request just skip that connection if registry address is a multicast address.

## Verifying this change

Verified locally to confirm that the exception trace is no longer logged.

Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

title: fix #210 JavaDeserializer._constructor.newInstance([null, null]) NPE
body:
this is an old issue #210

- I think if use `constructor(null...)` throw `NPE` then try use constructor(new Arg1(), new Arg2()) again to instance a bean, is a good idea.

-  JavaDeserializer NPF for [org.springframework.jdbc.UncategorizedSQLException](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-framework/blob/master/spring-jdbc/src/main/java/org/springframework/jdbc/UncategorizedSQLException.java#L47)
```java
public UncategorizedSQLException(String task, @Nullable String sql, SQLException ex) {
	super(task + "; uncategorized SQLException" + (sql != null ? " for SQL [" + sql + "]" : "") +
			"; SQL state [" + ex.getSQLState() + "]; error code [" + ex.getErrorCode() + "]; " +
			ex.getMessage(), ex);
	this.sql = sql;
}
```

- the stacktrace like this:
```
com.alibaba.com.caucho.hessian.io.HessianProtocolException: 'org.springframework.jdbc.UncategorizedSQLException' could not be instantiated
	at com.alibaba.com.caucho.hessian.io.JavaDeserializer.instantiate(JavaDeserializer.java:313)
    ...
Caused by: java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
	... 
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.springframework.jdbc.UncategorizedSQLException.<init>(UncategorizedSQLException.java)
	...
```

1. fix jvm shutdown gracefully bug, including annotation bean and server running state error. see: https://github.com/apache/incubator-dubbo/issues/1606

title: Extension: Eager Thread Pool
body:
A thread pool that can provide faster processing speeds when there are more tasks (of course it consumes more resources)
* When the number of tasks exceeds the core size, a new thread is first started to execute the task instead of putting it into the queue.
* When the number of tasks is lower than the core size for a long time, the core size threads are maintained and redundant threads are recycled.
* Compared to the fixed pool：When there are more tasks, provide more workers to handle the tasks.
* Compared to the cached pool：The task queue in the cached pool is actually a SynchronousQueue and does not have the ability to cache tasks.
* Whether to fail fail or put into a queue when a thread runs out：Both are feasible and need to consider which way should be applied according to the business scenario. Delayed scenarios are not allowed. Failfast is more reasonable than queues. However, if there is a certain tolerance for delays, queues are more reasonable than failfast.
* Reference: Tomcat's thread pool design

title: Restore the bug that attachment has not been updated in the RpcContext when the Dubbo built-in retry mechanism is triggered
body:
## What is the purpose of the change

Restore the bug that attachment has not been updated in the RpcContext when the Dubbo built-in retry mechanism is triggered.

We found that when Dubbo through Filter to Provider traceId and spanId (transfer access to distributed tracking parameters used by the system), when the trigger Consumer Dubbo retry mechanism, Provider (response but at the Consumer end of overtime) the data is always the first call to traceId and spanId (Consumer in retry timeout the RpcContext.getContext (.SetAttachment) (String key, String value) set up a new traceId and spanId did not pass in the past).

This bug desc also same as https://github.com/alibaba/dubbo/issues/513

## Brief changelog

Restore the bug that attachment has not been updated in the RpcContext when the Dubbo built-in retry mechanism is triggered

## Verifying this change

When modified, when the Dubbo retry mechanism is triggered, the new RpcContext attachments can be passed to Provider as desired.

title: [Dubbo- support unit router feature] May be a nice feature.
body:
## What is the purpose of the change

Support unit router feature for dubbo.

What problems can this feature solve?

case 1:
  If we have two instance of services or more, we call it serviceA(192.168.0.1), serviceA(192.168.0.2)
 
 ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15549777/37189200-08a40706-238e-11e8-9802-4dc38676c08d.png)

We want to invoke serviceA (192.168.0.2) first, if serviceA (192.168.0.2) is not available then invoke  serviceA (192.168.0.1) automatically.

case 2:

If we have many relative services, We call it serviceA(192.168.0.1), serviceA(192.168.0.2), serviceB(192.168.1.1), serviceB(192.168.1.2), serviceC(192.168.3.1), serviceC(192.168.3.2)

dependencies of service: 
serviceA -> serviceB -> serviceC

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15549777/37189624-54607bfa-2390-11e8-9071-9820d6a0ce5d.png)

We can flexibly build call paths and automatically downgrade calls.

case 3:

We can take advantage of this feature to realize the priority routing of the same machine room service.
 
Notes:

if use unit feature, unit router will be last invoked, 
because if the unit router has no match, it will return the previous available invokers, this is very important !

Easy to use:

 Set service and reference are same unit value. or use global configuration.
 case 1：
 consumer.xml:  `<dubbo:reference id="XXX" check="false" interface="XXX" unit="anything"/>`
 provider.xml:     `<dubbo:service interface="XXX" ref="bean" unit="same as reference"/>`

 case 2：(global)
 consumer.xml & provider.xml : `<dubbo:provider unit="anything"/>`， "anything"  suggest same both side.

## Brief changelog

1. add unit property for dubbo.xsd
2. add new UnitRouter and so on

## Verifying this change

Here is more detail unit tests:
1. com.alibaba.dubbo.rpc.cluster.router.unit.UnitRouterTest
2. com.alibaba.dubbo.registry.dubbo.RegistryDirectoryTest

I have verified that the unit test has been correct and passed.

Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

- [ ] Make sure there is a [GITHUB_issue](https://github.com/alibaba/dubbo/issues) filed for the change (usually before you start working on it). Trivial changes like typos do not require a GITHUB issue. Your pull request should address just this issue, without pulling in other changes - one PR resolves one issue.

body:
update dubbo

## What is the purpose of the change

XXXXX

## Brief changelog

XX

## Verifying this change

XXXX

Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

- [x] Make sure there is a [GITHUB_issue](https://github.com/alibaba/dubbo/issues) filed for the change (usually before you start working on it). Trivial changes like typos do not require a GITHUB issue. Your pull request should address just this issue, without pulling in other changes - one PR resolves one issue. 
- [ ] Format the pull request title like `[Dubbo-XXX] Fix UnknownException when host config not exist`. Each commit in the pull request should have a meaningful subject line and body.
- [ ] Write a pull request description that is detailed enough to understand what the pull request does, how, and why.
- [ ] Write necessary unit-test to verify your logic correction, more mock a little better when cross module dependency exist. If the new feature or significant change is committed, please remember to add integration-test in [test module](https://github.com/alibaba/dubbo/tree/master/dubbo-test).
- [ ] Run `mvn clean install -DskipITs` to make sure unit-test pass. Run `mvn clean test-compile failsafe:integration-test`  to make sure integration-test pass.
- [ ] If this contribution is large, please file an [Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement](http://www.apache.org/licenses/#clas).

title: [Dubbo-#1322] refactor dubbo deployment process
body:
## What is the purpose of the change

Resolve #1322.  We can run `maven deploy` in root directory and deploy all sub modules of dubbo project to central repository:
 
1. dubbo.jar. all in one jar, same as before.
2. dubbo-xxx.jar. a packaged jar for every sub module.

More details please check discussion in #1322.

## Brief changelog

1. extract serialization module from `dubbo-common`.
2. change module name `dubbo-rpc-default` to `dubbo-rpc-dubbo`.
3. change 'skip_maven_deploy' to false, so all modules can be deployed to central repository.
4. upgrade hessian-lite version to 3.2.2.

## Verifying this change

1. run `mvn deploy` and see if dubbo project can be deployed to repository as expected.
2. check `dubbo.jar` and every `separated jar` works fine in a simple demo.

Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

- [x] Make sure there is a [GITHUB_issue](https://github.com/alibaba/dubbo/issues) filed for the change (usually before you start working on it). Trivial changes like typos do not require a GITHUB issue. Your pull request should address just this issue, without pulling in other changes - one PR resolves one issue. 
- [x] Format the pull request title like `[Dubbo-XXX] Fix UnknownException when host config not exist`. Each commit in the pull request should have a meaningful subject line and body.
- [x] Write a pull request description that is detailed enough to understand what the pull request does, how, and why.
- [x] Write necessary unit-test to verify your logic correction, more mock a little better when cross module dependency exist. If the new feature or significant change is committed, please remember to add integration-test in [test module](https://github.com/alibaba/dubbo/tree/master/dubbo-test).
- [x] Run `mvn clean install -DskipITs` to make sure unit-test pass. Run `mvn clean test-compile failsafe:integration-test`  to make sure integration-test pass.
- [ ] If this contribution is large, please file an [Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement](http://www.apache.org/licenses/#clas).
